GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing information from the requested article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates content on the requested article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments associated with the passed article id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a new comment to the requested article

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Deletes the comment by the id and returns no content

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of information on the requested user
